plugin.comment: Split-screen throttle settings should be more aggresive than non-local co-op settings block index 0: default non split screen block index 1: two way split screen block index 2: three way split screen block index 3: four way split screen block index 4: one additional non-local player block index 5: two additional non-local players block index 6: three additional non-local players

bit.name: Disable First Person Depth Of Field
Disable Instance Occlusion Queries
bit.tooltip: WARNING Will likely hurt perf on most maps

float32.name: Object Fade Modifier
float32.tooltip: scales down the distances at which objects first imposter and then fade out

float32.name: Object Lighting Time Limit
float32.tooltip: per frame time limit to spend sampling new lighting radiosity

float32.name: IO Fade Modifier
float32.tooltip: scales down the distances at which IOs imposter

int32.name: Maximum Forward Dynamic Lights
int32.tooltip: will quickly fade gpu lights when we try to render more than this many

float32.name: Forward Dynamic Light Fade Distance Scale
float32.tooltip: scales the size used for distance-fade (set smaller to make it fade earlier)

int32.name: Maximum Screenspace Dynamic Lights
int32.tooltip: will quickly fade screenspace lights when we try to render more than this many

float32.name: Screenspace Light Fade Distance Scale
float32.tooltip: scales the size used for distance-fade (set smaller to make it fade earlier)

int32.name: Maximum Effect Lights (Screenspace)
int32.tooltip: limits the number of effect lights we allow to be active at a time (eg. needler needles lighting up objects)
